long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Use QuickSort to easily clip and save what you want from around the web. QuickSort is a tool built for developers to save code snippets for quick lookup later, instead of going down the web search rabbit hole over and over.

QuickSort cleans, auto-formats, tags and organizes your code snippets. Comes with a mini editor with proper syntax highlighting and support for multiple programming languages.
